fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Culture, Energy, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Member of EBO system. Number one priority is to promote FTA discussions and move onto negotiation phase.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: The European Business Organisations Worldwide Network #E01267#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1267#Member#C
goals__remit: To promote EU in NZ from a trade and cultural perspective. To work towards tariff free trade between the two. To provide a platform for EU membership states co-operation locally in NZ. To lift the profile and understanding of EU in NZ. To receive and support delegations from EU. To host events for our members
relevant_communication: We have no paid staff and small budget based on $ 100 membership fee. We have a website where we publish events and papers from time to time. Businesses are not members of our organization but of respective country's own business councils. Our members are the business organisation representing EU member states and the Consuls from these states and some University professors. This limits our membership to 40-50 members
